item.title: Messing around with Perkeep (part 1)
item.description: Perkeep is a project authored by Brad Fitzpatrick (of Go fame). It aims to be a good solution to long term, self-hosted, personal data storage and ticks many of the boxes Iâ€™ve been looking for.
